column5: You forgot to add Walleye....I have a feeling lots of ppl would fish for them!!
Need to add Lakers as well
LOL Gerritt....  I agree...we should have both....small ones are pickeral....big ones are walleye....I fish for walleye....

didn't pick anything on the poll.....but I fish for pretty much anything that swims 12 months a year..for me there really isn't a beginning and end to fishing season...it's 12 months a year long, always something is in season to fish for, my 2008 season started January 2nd when I renewed my liscence
Hmm.....are canned corn and boilies artificial or live baits?
I fish for walleye but catch mostly galvanized pike
I asked myself the same question. I figure it's live since they are not artificial.

Favorites are pike and specks.  Followed very closely by anything else that swims.  For the fishing up here I use a fair bit of live/dead bait.  In dirty waters it often helps.  I like spring and fall fishing best.
I mostly fish for speckled trout and walleye.  They were not in the poll.
